ing: 12 hard-boiled eggs, halved lengthwise with yolks and whites separated
des: "I concocted this recipe for my longtime friend and colleague Colleen B. for her 60th birthday celebration. Decorate with a sprigs of parsley or dill."
ins:
Combine egg yolks, mayonnaise, mustard, and hot sauce in a food processor; puree until smooth.
Spoon egg yolk mixture into a pastry bag with a decorative tip; pipe filling into the cavity of the egg white halves.
